Title: Require Authentication for All Sensitive Pages
DirectLink: Require Authentication for All Sensitive Pages

Data:
==Applies To==

* Web Applications

==What to Do==

Require authentication for all private resources.

==Why==

All pages that have private information should require authentication to prevent unauthorized information disclosure.

==How==

To require authentication for all private resources:

# **Identify all sensitive pages.** Make a list of all pages that handle sensitive or private information.
# **Define roles.** Define access roles for your application. These roles should include administrative users and various types of users specific to your application.
# **Implement authentication.** Implement and document authentication APIs to satisfy all application requirements.
# **Require authentication for all sensitive pages.** Add code to all sensitive pages that checks if the user is authenticated and authorized to view them.
